Memory: 2 GB

Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0

Game information:  
=================

Game Van Helsing 2: Death Defying (The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing II) -
this is not just a collection of a dozen new maps and monsters, but now a sequel,
keep getting better from the first game. Except for small improvements and dodelok,
it also acquired a number of new features.

And yet ... It's not exactly a feature, but if you like living dialogues, cheeky humor
and "easter eggs" of the first game, you'll be happy to hear that in the continuation
of this even more.

Repack Features:  
=================


The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing 2
Do not cut / recoded
Game Version - 1.0.02
